summary: I\'ve always thought skeletons should laugh and scream like maniacs when in combat... Now they do.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve always thought skeletons should laugh and scream like maniacs when in combat... Now they do. This is my first mod, and I thought other people might like it too so I decided to share it.

To install, just place the data folder in your skyrim directory.

I\'ve uploaded a new version with new (and in my opinion) better sounds. Enjoy. I\'ll add a video and some samples soon.
author: DirtyDireWolf
